name: BrainWorks
description:
This game is a submission for the Low-Tier Game Jam #2, the Theme is survival and BrainWorks' approach to survival is executing basic commands in a CMD prompt, in order to maintain the needs of a human. 

The game doesn't have an end-goal, but if the human's "Health bar" drops to a 0 - you lose and are prompted to try again.

The commands are pretty limited, but it would still be challenging for someone who's got no prior experience in programming. Feel free to ask for tips!
